wikihiero-desc:
{{desc|name=WikiHiero|url=http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:WikiHiero}}
Wikihiero is a markup language to render hieroglyphics. See [//www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:WikiHiero Extension:WikiHiero] for more information.
hieroglyphs:
{{doc-special|Hieroglyphs}}
WikiHiero is a markup language to render Hieroglyphics. See [[mw:Extension:WikiHiero|Extension:WikiHiero]] for more information.
wikihiero-help-link: A link to a help page about the format used by WikiHiero, used in {{mw-msg|wikihiero-special-page-text}}. Keep the link external.
wikihiero-eol: Help text that says that "!" inserts an end of a line of Egyptian text.
